name: The Voice (itch) (EdmundW196)
description: The Voice is a twine game I have created which places you into an unknown facility where you have no memory or recollection of why you are there. You are placed through a series of tests which will have an influence on your story and the way it plays out. My goal for this is to place you as the player into a foreign unreal situation where you make decisions and wonder why and how you are there. I hope to keep you engaged in a story which slowly becomes uncovered as you continue playing but also make you question the decisions you made and wonder why your story ends the way it does.
